participant_1.background:
I enjoy reading books from different cultures, including books from my parents' homeland of Italy.
I started playing recreational baseball more often and even took lessons to improve my skills.
i m a huge fan of jason mraz.
connor mcgregor is my favorite fighter.
I am proud of my passion for swimming and how it has helped me to stay healthy and active.

participant_2.background:
I hope my parents don't find out about my deployment.
i wonder what it would be like to be a different gender.
My favorite book is a collection of spooky Halloween stories.
i had to drop out of college to help with my grandparents.
I want a new home that is affordable and close to work so I can save money and keep my financial troubles a secret from my parents.

content.text: Hey there how are you doing today?
Pretty good, I just got back from deployment!
Deployment! That sounds amazing! Where did you go?
I went to South Korea, it was really fun.
I've always wanted to go to South Korea! What did you do there?
I did a lot of training, and I got to explore the country a little bit.
That sounds like it was a great experience! I'm glad you had fun.
Thanks! I'm glad I'm back, but I'm definitely going to miss the food.
Korean food is so good! I love kimchi.
Me too! I'm going to have to find a good place to get it here.
There's a really good Korean restaurant in my neighborhood, I can give you the address if you want.
No problem! It's called "The House of Kimchi", it's really good.
Awesome! I'll definitely have to check it out.
You're welcome! I hope you like it.
